steps.title: Stap 1: Opdracht aanvaarden.
questionTitles: Snap je de opdracht cq. klacht?

steps.title: Stap 3.1: Safe for maintenance: Check items.
questionTitles: Check LuForm; 0001 for servicing status and completeness (aircraft technical log).
Check if wheelchocks are in position.
Check if fire-extinguisher is around. If OK, check expire dates.
Check if grounding cable is installed.
Check if safety covers are installed/placed.
Check if panels and doors are locked.
Check if ground safety pin is installed on the Arresting Hook.

steps.title: Stap 3.2: Safe for maintenance: Safe for Entry cockpit.
questionTitles: Check if canopy safety pins are placed and properly installed.

steps.title: Stap 3.3: Safe for maintenance: Cockpit Inspection.
questionTitles: Check if Battery power switch is in ‘OFF’ position.
Check if other elctrical switchers are in ‘OFF’ or ‘Safe’ position.
Check if fire-extinguisher is around. If OK, check expire dates.
Check if LG handle is ‘DOWN’ position.
Check if safety covers are installed/placed.
Check if panels and doors are locked.
Check if the Throttle is in the ‘OFF’ position.

steps.title: Stap 3.4: Uitvoering.
questionTitles: Is afwijken van procedure AMM nodig.
Worden er andere opdrachten uitgevoerd die mijn werkzaamheden kunnen verstoren.
Mogelijkheid netjes en ordelijk te werken.

steps.title: Stap 6: Opruimen/schoonmaken.
questionTitles: Support equipment op zijn plaats gezet.
Maintenance manuals in de kast gezet.
